content.query:
SELECT  
    TRY_CAST(PARSENAME(REPLACE([file_path], '/', '.'), 3) AS INT) AS year,
    TRY_CAST(PARSENAME(REPLACE([file_path], '/', '.'), 2) AS INT) AS month,
    TRY_CAST(PARSENAME(REPLACE([file_path], '/', '.'), 1) AS INT) AS day,
    COUNT(*) AS row_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stdimentoringdatalakecm.dfs.core.windows.net/data/silver/events/year=*/month=*/day=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        file_path VARCHAR(1024)  -- captures the full path of each file
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY  
    TRY_CAST(PARSENAME(REPLACE([file_path], '/', '.'), 3) AS INT),
    TRY_CAST(PARSENAME(REPLACE([file_path], '/', '.'), 2) AS INT),
    TRY_CAST(PARSENAME(REPLACE([file_path], '/', '.'), 1) AS INT)
ORDER BY  
    year, month, day;
